name: Sword
legend: A one handed sword that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Greathammer
legend: A massive iron hammer that is in decent condition, it will serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Greataxe
legend: A large two-handed axe that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Greatsword
legend: A large two-handed sword that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Spear
legend: A spear that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Axe
legend: An axe that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Staff
legend: A sturdy iron staff that works great as a weapon.

name: Katana
legend: A katana that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Dual Swords
legend: A set of one-handed swords that are in decent condition, they would serve nicely as weapons.

name: Dagger
legend: A small dagger that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Rapier
legend: A rapier that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Claws
legend: A set of iron claws that are in decent condition, they would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Musket
legend: A decent musket decorated with bronze metal.

name: Flintlock
legend: A decent flintlock pistol decorated with bronze metal.

name: Dual Flintlocks
legend: A set of decent flintlock pistols decorated with bronze metal.

name: Bow
legend: A well crafted bow made out of wood.

name: Wooden Shield
legend: A lightweight shield made of wood. Use it for blocking in order to increase your damage resistance.

name: Keraxe Broadsword
legend: A rough broadsword made out of iron, normally used by the vikings of Keraxe.

name: Keraxe Shield
legend: A rough shield made out of iron, normally used by the vikings of Keraxe.

name: Iron Shield
legend: A shield made out of iron. Use it for blocking in order to increase your damage resistance.

name: Trident
legend: A trident that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Hammer
legend: An iron hammer that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Club
legend: A small wooden club that works great as a blunt weapon.

name: Ravenna Sword
legend: A one-handed sword made out of bronze, made to be used by the Bronze Legion of the Ravenna Realm.

name: Ravenna Shield
legend: A shield made out of bronze, bearing the symbol of the Ravenna Realm. Use it for blocking in order to increase your damage resistance.

name: Samerian Shield
legend: A shield made out of brass and wood, bearing the symbol of the Sameria Province. Use it for blocking in order to increase your damage resistance.

name: Morning Star
legend: A morning star that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Cutlass
legend: A cutlass that is in decent condition, It would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Ravenna War Shield
legend: A heavy tower shield made out of bronze, bearing the symbol and colors of the Ravenna Realm.

name: Poison Tooth Dagger
legend: A dagger crafted from a Poison Jaws' tooth. It seems to make a sturdy weapon, and its magic properties leave enemies poisoned.

name: Ravenna Greatsword
legend: A large two-handed sword made out of bronze, made to be used by the Bronze Legion of the Ravenna Realm.

name: Ravenna Greataxe
legend: A large two-handed axe made of bronze that is in decent condition, it would serve nicely as a weapon.

name: Sunken Staff
legend: An ornate green and gold staff made out of arcanium metal that has spent hundreds of years underwater, causing its properties to change. It seems to constantly produce water.

name: Atlantean Spear
legend: A spear that has been altered by constant exposure to the Dark Sea's rain.

name: Atlantean Bow
legend: A bow that has been altered by constant exposure to the Dark Sea's rain.

name: Thalassi
legend: A long cutlass with a weathered blade adorned with a dark red grip and a purple guard, representing the colors of Pirate Duke De'Roy. It was taken from Captain Maria after she was defeated in the Nimbus Sea.

name: Lance of Loyalty
legend: A heavy lance made out of bronze with a red trim. It was specifically made for General Argos, the Lion of Old Ravenna, and was stolen from him after he was killed in the dungeons of Fort Talos in the Bronze Sea.

name: Commodore Kai's Saber
legend: A well-made sabre that was forged for Red Sabre Kai, the Grand Navy Commodore of Silverhold in the Bronze Sea.

name: Greenwish Cultist Staff
legend: A metal staff adorned with a green quartz crystal.

name: Stormcaller
legend: An ornate bow that was custom-made for the Ravenna noble Lord Elius, but was stolen after he was defeated in the sky of the Bronze Sea.

name: Plunderers
legend: A set of four identical flintlocks with a purple and red colour scheme, representing the colours of Pirate Lord Duke De'Roy. They were taken from Captain Maria after she was defeated in the Nimbus Sea.

name: Lion's Halberd
legend: An enormous halberd made out of bronze. It was specifically made for General Argos, the Lion of Old Ravenna, and was stolen from him after he was killed in the dungeons of Fort Talos in the Bronze Sea.

name: Atlantean Shield
legend: A large crustacean shell used as a shield by the Atlanteans of the Dark Sea.

name: Atlantean Rapier
legend: A mutilated swordfish that can be used as a rapier, usually wielded by Atlanteans in the Dark Sea.

name: Sunken Sword
legend: A medium-sized, one handed sword made out of arcanium metal that has spent hundreds of years underwater, causing its properties to change. It seems to constantly produce water.

name: Silent Blades
legend: A pair of high quality metal claws used by Merlot the Waltz of Death, an Architect of the Assassin Syndicate that operates in the Red Corner, their hideout in the Bronze Sea.

name: Sanguine
legend: A high quality blood-red dagger used by Merlot the Waltz of Death, an Architect of the Assassin Syndicate that operates in the Red Corner, their hideout in the Bronze Sea.

name: Atlantean Cutlass
legend: A cutlass that has been altered by the constant exposure to the Dark Sea's rain.

name: Atlantean Claws
legend: A set of strange beast-like claws taken from an Atlantean in the Dark Sea.

name: Siren Bow
legend: A bow made of a fine silver metal adorned with gold decorations, usually used by Sirens, a mythical creature found in the Dark Sea. They appear as beautiful women, singing, only to lure in sailors and kill them with their wings and fangs.

name: Noble Thunderspear
legend: An ornate spear that was custom-made for the Ravenna noble Lord Elius, but was stolen after he was defeated in the sky of the Bronze Sea.

name: Scimitars of Storm
legend: A set of bronze scimitars that were custom-made for the Ravenna noble Lord Elius, but were stolen after he was defeated in the sky of the Bronze Sea.

name: Triasta of Bronze
legend: A trident made of arcanium-bronze alloy, to allow it to conduct some magic. It was specifically made for King Calvus IV, the Third King of Ravenna, and was stolen from him after he was killed in Ravenna Castello, at the heart of the Ravenna Realm in the Bronze Sea.

name: Vindicator
legend: An exquisite greathammer made of white metal, embedded with a bright sapphire gemstone. Legends say it once belonged to a powerful member of the Grand Navy, who disappeared without a trace...

name: Scald Tooth Dagger
legend: A dagger crafted from the tooth of an unknown sea monster. It seems to make a sturdy weapon, and its magic properties leave enemies burning.

name: Atlantean Mace
legend: A large bone with a sea urchin attached to it, used as a sharp mace-like weapon by Atlanteans in the Dark Sea.

name: Atlantean Greatsword
legend: A large two-handed sword that has been altered by constant exposure to the Dark Sea's rain.

name: Nocturne
legend: A high quality dagger that once once used by the One Beyond Reach, a mysterious woman who killed members of the Assassin Syndicate for nearly a decade, unable to be traced down.

name: Goldreaver
legend: An enormous cutlass that was forged for ceremonial purposes before it was stolen and painted gold by the notorious pirate Captain Crowe, leader of the Goldsail Pirates based in the Nimbus Sea.

name: Khepri
legend: A scimitar made of gold-enameled steel, with a sunstone gem embedded in the hilt intended for storing magic energy. It was one of the signature weapons of Commander Hathor, the castellan of Fort Montu

name: Lost Chief's Axe and Maw
legend: A set of one-handed swords that are most likely decades old, but still seem to be usable.

name: Siderros
legend: A pair of large, high quality axes that were once used by Jarl Ivar of the Keraxe Kingdom, and were taken from him when he was killed in single combat during the Keraxe-Sameria War.

name: Sinbane
legend: A greatsword with a large crossguard and pommel that was taken from Delamere the Blessed Knight in the Nimbus Sea, a member of a mysterious order that will allegedly bring peace to the War Seas.

name: Colossal Greatsword
legend: An enourmous steel greatsword that was wielded by Evander the Mountainbreaker, a bounty hunter from the Thorne Empire that wanders the Bronze Sea.

name: Ruined Sifenya
legend: The ruined ancestral weapon of the Ozun family, a light, thin greatsword with a large sapphire embedded in the pommel. It was taken from Meng Ozun's corpse at Pefkos in the Nimbus Sea, where it was found slightly rusted after being exposed to the elements.

name: Rusty Zweihander
legend: An enormous zweihander sword that has been weathered down over the years, giving its edge a hazardous sting. The blade still seems strong enough to be used, though it would require a fair amount of strength to wield adequately. It was found inside a deadly cave need in the Nimbus Wilds of the Nimbus Sea's sky.

name: Poison Axe
legend: A worn axe coated in a layer of poison, originally wielded by Veyne, leader of the Veridian Hunters bounty hunting group based in the Bronze Sea.

name: Beast Bone Cleaver
legend: A large beast bone carved into the shape of a cleaver, originally wielded by Captain Vatnulf, Quartermaster of the Jaw Pirates based in the Bronze Sea.

name: Ravenwing
legend: A two-handed axe with good reach adorned with a historical Keraxe design on the blade. It was originally wielded by Thane Harjvindr, leader of the Shadow Ravens, a secret Keraxe scouting force that is sometiems found in the Nimbus Sea.

name: Fossil Spear
legend: A spear fashioned out of the bone of some long dead beast, a weapon used by the Grey Ones of the Nimbus Wilds.

name: Fossil Spear
legend: A spear fashioned out of the bone of some long dead beast, a weapon used by the Grey Ones of the Nimbus Wilds.

name: Fossil Club
legend: The bone of some long dead beast, usually used as a weapon used by the Grey Ones of the Nimbus Wilds.

name: Atum
legend: A morning star made of gold-enameled steel, with a sunstone gem embedded in it intended in it for storing magic energy. It was one of the signature weapons of Commander Hathor, the castellan of Fort Montu.

name: Ruined Fulmenor
legend: A bronze mace that was once wielded by King Octavious Caesar, the Second King of Ravenna. Exposure to the elements has damaged it heavily, but the gemstones embedded in its head still swim with energy.

name: Spiked Greatclub
legend: A giant wooden club reinforced with metal spikes, originally wielded by Harzog, leader of the Bearpaw Bandits based in the Bronze Sea.

name: Skull Greathammer
legend: A human skull stuck on the end of a stick, a weapon used by the Grey Chief, leader of the Grey Ones of the Nimbus Wilds

name: Spiked Tower Shield
legend: A sturdy tower shield made out of steel.

name: Dual Swiftstrider Flintlocks
legend: A set of high quality flintlock pistols originally used by the Swiftstriders bounty hunting group based in the Nimbus Sea.

name: Swiftstrider Flintlock
legend: A high quality flintlock pistol originally used by the Swiftstriders bounty hunting group based in the Nimbus Sea.

name: Swiftshot
legend: A high quality musket originally wielded by Lady Lysara, the leader of the Swiftstriders bounty hunting group based in the Nimbus Sea.

name: Greatbow
legend: A large heavy bow made of high quality wood, painted black and polished. It was wielded by Maine the Hunter, a criminal from an unknown organization in the Nimbus Sea.
